languages.text: "Аделина мертва, как и все они. Живи с виной, а не давай ей пожрать себя".

traits.locale_text: "Аделина мертва. Ты прекрасно знаешь это. Настало время отпустить ее".

languages.text: "Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."
languages.original_text: "Аделина мертва, как и все они. Живи с виной, а не давай ей пожрать себя".

traits.locale_text: "Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Learn to live with your guilt without letting it consume you."
"Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Learn to live with your guilt without letting it consume you."
"Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Don't let it consume you."
"Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Don't let it consume you."
"Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."
"Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."

languages.text: «Adeline está muerta, igual que los demás. Viva con su pena. No permita que le consuma».
languages.original_text: "Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."

traits.locale_text: «Adeline está muerta, igual que los demás. Viva con su pena. No permita que le consuma».

languages.text: 「アデリーンも、残りの者も死んだ。罪悪感と共に生きるのだ。罪の意識に飲まれてはいけない」
languages.original_text: "Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."

traits.locale_text: 「アデリーンも、残りの者も死んだ。罪悪感と共に生きるのだ。罪の意識に飲まれてはいけない」

languages.text: “艾德琳已经死了，其他人也都死了。想办法忍受这种罪恶感吧，不要让它吞噬你。”
languages.original_text: "Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."

traits.locale_text: “艾德琳已经死了，其他人也都死了。想办法忍受这种罪恶感吧，不要让它吞噬你。”

languages.text: "Adeline ist tot, genau wie die anderen, Lebt mit Eurer Schuld. Lasst Euch nicht von ihr verzehren."
languages.original_text: "Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."

traits.locale_text: "Adeline ist tot, genau wie die anderen, Lebt mit Eurer Schuld. Lasst Euch nicht von ihr verzehren."

languages.text: « Adeline est morte, et le reste de vos apprentis également. Apprenez à vivre avec, ne laissez pas la culpabilité vous abattre. »
languages.original_text: "Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."

traits.locale_text: « Adeline est morte, et le reste de vos apprentis également. Apprenez à vivre avec, ne laissez pas la culpabilité vous abattre. »

languages.text: "Adeline, diğerleri gibi öldü. Vicdan azabınla yaşamayı öğren. Seni tüketmesine müsaade etme."
languages.original_text: "Adeline is dead, and so are the rest of them. Live with your guilt. Do not let it consume you."
